entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid implicit conversion from long to int #73698
  • "Use primary constructor" does not produce a diagnostic for an empty public parameterless constructor #73695
  • Allow manually forcing a refresh of the IntelliSense database #73693
  • Compile Error After Upgrading - SDK 8.0.300 - 'Class1' does not contain a definition for 'DisposeAsync' #73691
  • A potential bug in custom string interpolation constructor resolving for `ref` parameters #73690
  • Scripting API - Operation is not supported on this platform. (when AOT published) #73689

Closed

  • Taghelpers break build on 8.0.300 with various errors (major impact, Area-Compilers) #73611
  • Allow manually forcing a refresh of the IntelliSense database #73694
  • StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces - Roslyn does not warn that a most-derived static interface method implementation will not be used #73686
  • Cannot define a raw string literal ending in double-quote #73677

PullRequests

Created

  • On-the-fly-docs content exclusion #73702
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update tagging to avoid jumping back to the UI thread when finished. #73699
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restore RazorCompiler EA layer for desktop #73697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • #66387 Update SyntaxGenerator.cs #73696
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73683
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Utilize ImmutableCollectionsMarshal to get ROS for XxHash128.Hash call #73692
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Return the SignatureHelp items nearest to the cursor #73606
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Final editor side changes for "allow ref struct" support #73700
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we sync source-generator versions over properly when doing a cone-sync #73688
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce cost of syntactic classification by around 25% while paging down through a file (and around 50% while arrowing down). #73673
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid having to go back to the UI thread in the navbar code #73681
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include more data for debugging purposes #73684
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert interval-tree type to a struct #73676
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add support for or-pattern in `IDE0010` #73574
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
